statements: SELECT * FROM monthly_statements WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_id, month FROM monthly_statements WHERE month = 'January';
SELECT statement FROM monthly_statements WHERE customer_id = 456;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM monthly_statements WHERE month = 'February';
SELECT customer_id, report FROM monthly_statements ORDER BY month DESC;
SELECT * FROM monthly_statements WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY month DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS num_statements FROM monthly_statements GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, month FROM monthly_statements WHERE month IN ('Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar');
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(DISTINCT month) AS num_months FROM monthly_statements GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_months > 3;
SELECT customer_id, SUBSTRING(statement, 1, 50) AS short_statement FROM monthly_statements WHERE LENGTH(statement) > 50 LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM monthly_statements
SELECT statement_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM monthly_statements WHERE customer_id = 100
SELECT * FROM account_activity ORDER BY activity_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_activity_amount FROM account_activity GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT statement_id, statement_date, total_amount FROM monthly_statements WHERE total_amount > 500
SELECT * FROM monthly_statements WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY statement_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM monthly_statements WHERE customer_id = 101 ORDER BY statement_date ASC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM monthly_statements GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 5000
SELECT MAX(total_amount) AS max_amount FROM monthly_statements
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_activity_amount FROM account_activity GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_activity_amount DESC
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, account_balance FROM CustomerAccounts
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000
SELECT customer_name, account_status FROM CustomerAccounts ORDER BY account_status DESC
SELECT statement_details FROM MonthlyStatements WHERE statement_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT MAX(account_balance) AS max_balance FROM CustomerAccounts
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, account_balance, account_status FROM CustomerAccounts WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_balance DESC
SELECT * FROM CustomerAccounts JOIN Transactions ON CustomerAccounts.customer_id = Transactions.customer_id WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_transaction_amount FROM Transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_transaction_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_transaction_amount DESC

SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM CustomerAccounts JOIN Transactions ON CustomerAccounts.customer_id = Transactions.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_transactions DESC
SELECT customer_id, AVG(account_balance) AS avg_balance FROM CustomerAccounts GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_balance > 5000 ORDER BY customer_id ASC
SELECT * FROM Monthly_Statements ORDER BY statement_date DESC, total_amount ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, statement_date, total_amount FROM Monthly_Statements WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT statement_id, customer_id, statement_date, total_amount FROM Monthly_Statements WHERE total_amount > 500 ORDER BY total_amount ASC
SELECT statement_id, statement_date, total_amount FROM Monthly_Statements WHERE statement_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY statement_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Account_Activity WHERE activity_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY activity_date ASC
SELECT * FROM Customer_Reviews WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY review_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, account_type, account_balance FROM Customer_Accounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, statement_date, total_amount FROM Monthly_Statements WHERE statement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT activity_id, activity_description, amount FROM Account_Activity WHERE amount < 0 ORDER BY activity_date LIMIT 5

SELECT c.customer_id, c.review_text, a.account_balance FROM Customer_Reviews c JOIN Customer_Accounts a ON c.customer_id = a.customer_id WHERE a.account_balance > 10000 ORDER BY a.account_balance ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM MonthlyStatements;
SELECT statement_id, customer_id, statement_date, total_amount FROM MonthlyStatements ORDER BY statement_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_type, amount FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM MonthlyStatements ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT transaction_type, amount FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(activity_id) AS activity_count FROM AccountActivity GROUP BY customer_id HAVING activity_count > 10;
SELECT report_content FROM Reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
